gameDetails.name: Agricola CZ-Deck
gameDetails.description:
A 24 card expansion to Agricola (12 Minor Improvements, 12 Occupations) published Sept/Oct 2009.
CZ relates to the Czech Republic - this expansion is based on Czech lore and history.
It was developed by MIND OK and Uwe Rosenberg and was originally available in Czech and German. But now in English as well.
The artwork was done by Klemens Franz in the style of the famous Czech author and artist Josef Lada.

The CZ-deck is included in Agricola: The Goodies Expansion
